product_name: Birkenstock Arizona Soft Footbed Sandals - Women's
long_description: Get ready for summer! The Birkenstock Arizona Soft Footbed sandals slide on easy for all-day comfort. The Arizona features an A-B width, which is the more narrow last from Birkenstock, but is equivalent to a regular width by industry standards. Thick yet supple suede leather straps feature 2 adjustable buckles for a secure and comfortable fit. The Birkenstock Soft footbeds feature a foam layer inserted between the cork layer and the suede liner for exceptional cushioning; footbeds provide moderate arch support. Birkenstock Arizona Soft Foodbed sandals feature flexible and lightweight shock-absorbing EVA outsoles.
short_description: Get ready for summer! The Birkenstock Arizona Soft Footbed sandals slide on easy for all-day comfort.
